dict.string: Only allow one copy of this macro to run at a time
Get the selected macros into Local_MacrosInfo, or cancel if error
Tell KM to start editing macro 'Local_MacroUUID'

set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to set _uuid to getvariable "Local_MacroUUID" instance kmInst tell application "Keyboard Maestro" to editMacro _uuid

This macro doesn't really have a name. It looks like it does, because Keyboard Maestro makes up a name when there isn't one specified.
Please enter a real name, and try again.
Prompt the user to re-order and re-number, abort if canceled

OK
Edit Macro Name
OK Cancel

Palette Organizer
Renumber
OK Cancel

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<title>Palette Organizer</title>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">

		<!-- ======== Top and Client =============================== -->
		<style type="text/css">
			body {
				overflow: hidden;
				font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
				font-size: 14px;
				text-align: center;
				margin: 0;
				background: #E0F2F5;
			}

			#tblPleaseWait {
				padding: 20px;
			}
			#divPleaseWaitMessage {
				font-size: 20px;
				font-weight: bold;
				padding-bottom: 20px;
			}
			#divText {
				font-size: 14px;
			}

			#tblCompleted {
				padding-left: 20px;
				padding-right: 10px;
				padding-top: 20px;
				padding-bottom: 10px;
				width:100%;
			}
			#divCompletedMessage {
				font-size: 20px;
				font-weight: bold;
				padding-bottom: 5px;
			}
			#divOkButton a {
				float: right;
				width: 50px;
				margin-top:5px;
			}

			.hidden {
				display: none;
			}

			.okButton {
				box-shadow:inset 0px 1px 0px 0px #bbdaf7;
				background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #79bbff 5%, #378de5 100%);
				background-color:#79bbff;
				border-radius:6px;
				border:1px solid #84bbf3;
				display:inline-block;
				cursor:pointer;
				color:#ffffff;
				font-family:Arial;
				font-size:15px;
				font-weight:bold;
				padding:6px 24px;
				text-decoration:none;
				text-shadow:0px 1px 0px #528ecc;
			}
			.okButton:hover {
				background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #378de5 5%, #79bbff 100%);
				background-color:#378de5;
			}
			.okButton:active {
				position:relative;
				top:1px;
			}

		</style>
		
		<!-- ======== KM10 Fixes ============================== -->
		<script type="text/javascript">
			Object.defineProperty(window, "screenX", {
					get: function () {
						return parseInt(window.KeyboardMaestro.Calculate("WINDOW(Left)"));
					}
			});

			Object.defineProperty(window, "screenY", {
				get: function () {
					return parseInt(window.KeyboardMaestro.Calculate("WINDOW(Top)"));
				}
			});
		</script>

		<script type="text/javascript">
			Node.prototype.toggleClass = function toggleClass(className, include) {
				var classNames = this.className.split(" ");
				var index = classNames.indexOf(className);
				if (include) {
					if (index < 0) {
						classNames.push(className);
					}
				} else {
					if (index >= 0) {
						classNames.splice(index, 1);
					}
				}
				this.className = classNames.join(" ");
			};

			var _left;
			var _top;
			var _width;
			var _height;
			var _availWindowWidth;
			var _availWindowHeight;
			var _completed;
			function KMWindow() {
				function setupAvailWindowWidthAndHeight() {
					function getFauxOrRealValue(varName, actualValue, actualOffsetValue) {
						var result;
						var str = window.KeyboardMaestro.GetVariable(varName);
						if (str) {
							result = parseInt(str);
							if (isNaN(result)) {
								result = actualValue;
							} else {
								result -= actualOffsetValue;
							}
						} else {
							result = actualValue;
						}
						return result;
					}

					// setupAvailWindowWidthAndHeight()
					_availWindowWidth = getFauxOrRealValue("Local_fauxAvailWindowWidth", window.screen.availWidth, 0);
					_availWindowHeight = getFauxOrRealValue("Local_fauxAvailWindowHeight", window.screen.availHeight, window.screen.availTop);
				} // setupAvailWindowWidthAndHeight()

				document.onkeydown = function(event) {
					if (event.which == 13 && _completed) {
						window.KeyboardMaestro.Cancel("Cancel");
					}
				};

				var ani = document.getElementById("ani") ;

				var tbl = document.getElementById("tblPleaseWait");
				_width = 434;
				_height = 166;
				document.body.style.width = _width + "px";
				document.body.style.height = _height + 'px';

				// center on the screen
				setupAvailWindowWidthAndHeight();
				_left = ((_availWindowWidth - _width) / 2) + window.screen.availLeft;
				_top = ((_availWindowHeight - _height) / 2) + window.screen.availTop;

				// setTimeout(function() {
				// 	showCompleted();
				// }, 2000);

				return _left + ", " + _top + ", " + _width + ", " + _height;
			}

			function showCompleted() {
				document.getElementById("tblPleaseWait").toggleClass("hidden", true);
				document.getElementById("tblCompleted").toggleClass("hidden", false);
				window.KeyboardMaestro.ResizeWindow(_left + ", " + _top + ", " + _width + ", " + (_height - 60));
				_completed = true;
			}
		</script>
	</head>

	<body data-kmwindowid="PaletteOrganizerPleaseWaitScreen">
		<table id="tblPleaseWait">
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divPleaseWaitMessage" >
						Please Wait while Changes are Applied...
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divAni" >
						<img id="ani" src="data:image/gif;" />
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table>
		<table id="tblCompleted" class="hidden">
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divCompletedMessage" >
						Finished!
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td>
					<div id="divOkButton" >
						<a id="btnOK" class="okButton" onclick="window.KeyboardMaestro.Cancel('Cancel')">OK</a>
					</div>
				</td>
			</tr>
		</table>
	</body>

</html>
